# Slick, Improved (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Slick (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|slick]]*, except it grants a +10 competence bonus on [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks.

Moderate conjuration; CL 10th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Grease (Spell)|grease]]**;* Price +15,000 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
